duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and maintain infrastructure-as-code solutions using the Terraform framework.
Write infrastructure code using the HashiCorp Configuration Language (HCL) to define and manage resources in cloud environments like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, troubleshoot issues, and provide technical expertise on infrastructure best practices.
Create and maintain Terraform modules and templates for consistent infrastructure deployment across environments.
Participate in code review processes to ensure high-quality and maintainable infrastructure-as-code.
Automate infrastructure tasks, such as provisioning and configuration, using Terraform’s features and integrations with other tools like Ansible, Puppet, or Chef.
Adhere to security and compliance requirements by implementing appropriate security controls in infrastructure code and following industry best practices.
Monitor, analyze, and optimize infrastructure by leveraging monitoring tools and implementing performance and cost optimizations.
Keep up to date with new Terraform features, industry trends, and cloud provider updates to drive innovation and ensure efficient infrastructure management.
